00008 Levenshtein::Levenshtein(vector<unsigned int> trans, vector<unsigned int> ref)
00009 {
00010         // init Matrix
00011         matrix.resize(trans.size()+1);
00012 
00013         for (unsigned int i=0; i<matrix.size(); i++)
00014                 matrix[i].resize(ref.size()+1);
00015 
00016         for (unsigned int i=0; i<matrix[0].size(); i++)
00017                 matrix[0][i]=i;
00018 
00019         for (unsigned int i=1; i<matrix.size(); i++)
00020                 matrix[i][0] = i;
00021 
00022         
00023         // fill Matrix
00024         for (unsigned int i=1; i < matrix.size(); i++){
00025                 for (unsigned int j=1; j<matrix[i].size(); j++){
00026                         // matching
00027                         unsigned int min = matrix[i-1][j-1];
00028 
00029                         // deletion
00030                         if (min > matrix[i-1][j])
00031                                         min = matrix[i-1][j];
00032 
00033                         // insertion
00034                         if (min > matrix[i][j-1])
00035                                         min = matrix[i][j-1];
00036 
00037                         if (trans[i] != ref[j])
00038                                 matrix[i][j] = min + 1; 
00039                         else
00040                                 matrix[i][j] = min;
00041                 }
00042         }
00043 }

00045 unsigned int Levenshtein::getDistance()
00046 {
00047         unsigned int i = matrix.size()-1;
00048         unsigned int j = matrix[matrix.size()-1].size()-1;
00049         return matrix[i][j];
00050 }

00052 string Levenshtein::getPath()
00053 {
00054         unsigned int i=matrix.size()-1;
00055         unsigned int j=matrix[0].size()-1;
00056         string res = "";
00057         while (!((i==0)&&(j==0)))
00058         {
00059                 if(i==0){
00060                         j--;
00061                         res = "i" + res;
00062                 }else{
00063                         if (j==0){
00064                                 i--;
00065                                 res = "d" + res;
00066                         }else{
00067                                 if ((matrix[i-1][j-1]<=matrix[i][j-1])&&(matrix[i-1][j-1]<=matrix[i-1][j])){
00068                                         i--;
00069                                         j--;
00070                                         res = "m" + res;
00071                                 }else{
00072                                         if (matrix[i][j-1]<matrix[i-1][j]){
00073                                                 j--;
00074                                                 res = "d" + res;
00075                                         }else{
00076                                                 if (matrix[i][j-1]==matrix[i-1][j]){
00077                                                         if (i<=j){
00078                                                                 j--;
00079                                                                 res = "i" + res;
00080                                                         }else{
00081                                                                 i--;
00082                                                                 res = "d" + res;
00083                                                         }
00084                                                 }else{
00085                                                         i--;
00086                                                         res = "d" + res;
00087                                                 }
00088                                         }
00089                                 }
00090                         }
00091                 }
00092         }
00093         return res;
00094 }
